channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Poshmark CEO and founder to step down
item.description: After nearly 15 years, Manish Chandra will transition to being a member of the board of directors. Namsun Kim, who has served as executive chairman si...

item.title: OpenAI Scrambles to Update GPT-5 After Users Revolt
item.description: GPT-5 was touted as a major upgrade to ChatGPT. Not all users think that’s the case, posting threads like “Kill 4o isn’t innovation, it’s erasure” on ...

item.title: In 'Alien: Earth', the Future Is a Corporate Hellscape
item.description: Alien: Earth creator Noah Hawley tells WIRED he imagined the planet’s future based on his fears as a parent about the present, from dystopian capitali...

item.title: An AI Model for the Brain Is Coming to the ICU
item.description: The Cleveland Clinic and startup Piramidal are developing an AI model trained on brain wave data to monitor intensive care patients.

item.title: US government seized $1M from Russian ransomware gang
item.description: A global law enforcement coalition targeted the infrastructure of the group behind the Royal and BlackSuit ransomware strains, allegedly responsible f...

item.title: WIRED Roundup: Unpacking OpenAI’s Government Partnership
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we discuss the week’s news, from bitcoin miners trying to beat Trump’s tariffs to OpenAI's new deal with the US gov...

item.title: Ocean’s new app brings inbox triage, tasks, and invites to Gmail users
item.description: Ocean debuts an email app for Gmail users with triage tools, a task manager, and more.

item.title: iOS 26 beta 6 adds new ringtones, snappy app launches, and more
item.description: The new developer beta release, iOS 26 beta 6, adds new ringtones, faster app launches, and fixes the Camera swipe direction issues.

item.title: How founders are ditching VC norms and finding capital on their own terms at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Founders today have more capital paths than ever. But how do you navigate them — and know which one actually supports your growth?

item.title: Ford’s Answer to China: A Completely New Way of Making Cars
item.description: The American automaker is spending billions on a radical reinvention of EV manufacturing, aimed squarely at taking on Chinese competition and Tesla.
